article_title: Arrest warrants issued for Netanyahu, Gallant and Hamas commander over alleged war crimes
sentence: A  warrant  was  also  issued  for  Mohammed  Deif  of  Hamas,  although  Israel  has  said  he  was  killed  in  an  air  strike  in  Gaza  in  July.

article_title: Arrest warrants issued for Netanyahu, Gallant and Hamas commander over alleged war crimes
sentence: In  May,  the  ICC  prosecutor  Karim  Khan  sought  warrants  for  Netanyahu,  Gallant,  Deif  and  two  other  Hamas  leaders  who  have  since  been  killed,  Ismail  Haniyeh  and  Yahya  Sinwar.

article_title: Arrest warrants issued for Netanyahu, Gallant and Hamas commander over alleged war crimes
sentence: The  prosecutor's  case  against  them  stems  from  the  events  of  7  October  2023,  when  Hamas  gunmen  attacked  southern  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  251  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Arrest warrants issued for Netanyahu, Gallant and Hamas commander over alleged war crimes
sentence: Israel  responded  to  the  attack  by  launching  a  military  campaign  to  eliminate  Hamas,  during  which  at  least  44,000  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Arrest warrants issued for Netanyahu, Gallant and Hamas commander over alleged war crimes
sentence: “The  court’s  decision  may  ease  some  of  my  pain,  but  my  sister’s  soul  -  and  those  of  tens  of  thousands  of  Palestinian  victims  -  will  not  find  peace  until  Netanyahu  and  his  army  leaders  are  behind  bars,”  Munira  al-Shami,  whose  sister  Wafa  was  killed  in  an  Israeli  attack  a  month  ago,  told  the  BBC.
